docs.snippet: It’s easy: just a little primer, foundation and powder, to match a tomboyish collection....

headline.main: German Lawyer Makes Hate-Speech Complaint Against Facebook
headline.print_headline: German Lawyer Makes Hate-Speech Complaint Against Facebook

docs.snippet: German prosecutors are again considering whether to press charges against Mark Zuckerberg and other Facebook executives for failing to staunch a tide of racist and threatening posts on the social network during an influx of migrants into Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: German prosecutors are again considering whether to press charges against Mark Zuckerberg and other Facebook executives for failing to staunch a tide of racist and threatening posts on the social network during an influx of migrants into Europe.

headline.main: Regional SAARC Summit Postponed Amid Rising Pakistani-Indian Tensions
headline.print_headline: Regional SAARC Summit Postponed Amid Rising Pakistani-Indian Tensions

docs.snippet: A summit of South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) leaders set for Islamabad in November has been postponed indefinitely, the Pakistani government said on Friday, amid rising tension between arch-rivals India and Pakistan....
docs.lead_paragraph: A summit of South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) leaders set for Islamabad in November has been postponed indefinitely, the Pakistani government said on Friday, amid rising tension between arch-rivals India and Pakistan.

headline.main: Police Clear Out Rome's 'Gloomy Street' Migrant Camp
headline.print_headline: Police Clear Out Rome's 'Gloomy Street' Migrant Camp

docs.snippet: Italian police on Friday cleared out the "Gloomy Street" transit camp in central Rome where thousands of migrants have slept over the past year as they made their way toward northern Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian police on Friday cleared out the "Gloomy Street" transit camp in central Rome where thousands of migrants have slept over the past year as they made their way toward northern Europe.

headline.main: 'Guac the Vote:' Houston Taco Trucks Seek to Register Voters
headline.print_headline: 'Guac the Vote:' Houston Taco Trucks Seek to Register Voters

docs.snippet: At Tacos Tierra Caliente — a food truck parked in a section of Houston where Spanish is spoken as often as English — $1.50 can buy such street taco staples as pollo (chicken), barbacoa (shredded beef) and lengua (tongue)....
docs.lead_paragraph: At Tacos Tierra Caliente — a food truck parked in a section of Houston where Spanish is spoken as often as English — $1.50 can buy such street taco staples as pollo (chicken), barbacoa (shredded beef) and lengua (tongue).

headline.main: German FinMin Declines Comment on Report Deutsche Near U.S. Settlement
headline.print_headline: German FinMin Declines Comment on Report Deutsche Near U.S. Settlement

docs.snippet: Germany's Finance Ministry declined to comment on Friday on a report that Deutsche Bank was close to a $5.4 billion (£4.17 billion) settlement with U.S. authorities over alleged misselling of mortgage-backed securities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's Finance Ministry declined to comment on Friday on a report that Deutsche Bank was close to a $5.4 billion (£4.17 billion) settlement with U.S. authorities over alleged misselling of mortgage-backed securities.

docs.snippet: In a story Sept. 30 about suspended Alabama Chief Justice Roy Moore, The Associated Press erroneously reported the age limit for judges could be raised if voters approve a measure on the November ballot to do so. The measure applies to other elect...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Sept. 30 about suspended Alabama Chief Justice Roy Moore, The Associated Press erroneously reported the age limit for judges could be raised if voters approve a measure on the November ballot to do so. The measure applies to other elected offices, but not judges.
